text: juqhOtiq yaja#mAnamEqvOBaqyata#H paqSuBiqH pari# gRuhNAtikRuqtaya#juqH saM BRu#tasaMBAraq ityA#huqrna saqBRuMtyA$H saMBAqrA na yaju#H kartaqvya#mityathOq Kalu# saqBRuMtyA# Eqva sa#BAMqrAH ka#rtaqvyaM ~Myaju# ryaqj~jasyaq samRu#ddhyaipunarniShkRuqtO rathOq dakShi#NA punaruthsyUqtaM ~MvAsa#H punaruthsRuqShTO#&naqDvAn pu#narAqdhEya#syaq samRu#ddhyai saqpta tE# agnE saqmidha#H saqpta jiqhvA itya#gnihOqtraM ju#hOtiq yatra#yatraiqvAsyaq nya#ktaqM tata# - [  ] 8
